Unintentionally Blank

Phil Nash on the Internet, Web Standards and Accessibility

Joining Forces For A Better Blogging Experience

Feb 19, 2007

by Phil Nash

Gack Ink the new, bring your own blog network recently had their first round of submissions. I had a go and entered this blog and am pleased to say that I was accepted, along with the following other blogs:

  • Brainfizzle
  • Writing Thoughts
  • Hamelife
  • Mother Earthbeats
  • Simply Sassy
  • Amanita Muscaria

I'm really looking forward to getting to know all the members of the network, it's a great opportunity to become a better blogger and to find other great bloggers too. I have already discovered a post that is going to help me this week, thanks to this network. Rory at Hamelife posted on how to swith from the new Blogger to Wordpress something I have been thinking about for a while now with another blog I deal with.

Well done to all the others who were accepted. If anyone else is interested, keep an eye on Gack Ink for network news and the next round of submissions.
